markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane School Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5107) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=218)

**Prerequisites**
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5106)

</column>

---

You gain your school’s initial school spell. If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by studying.
name: Arcane School Spell
